name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with 9+ years of experience in leveraging technical expertise to drive sales and improve customer relationship management. Proficient in providing technical support and developing market strategies that enhance product offerings. Strong negotiation skills, combined with the ability to engage clients effectively and foster long-term relationships. An adept communicator with a solid understanding of mechatronics concepts, ensuring alignment between customer needs and technical solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed strong relationships with clients by providing exceptional **technical support** during product demonstrations, contributing to a **25% increase** in customer satisfaction.
Utilized **Customer Relationship Management (CRM)** systems to manage client interactions and streamline communication, enhancing organizational efficiency.
Conducted market development strategies that resulted in a **15% growth** in sales revenue through targeted engagements and negotiations.
Led negotiations with key accounts, achieving a **30% improvement** in contract terms and conditions favorable to the company.
Collaborated with engineering teams to provide comprehensive product knowledge, ensuring that clients receive tailored solutions that meet their needs.
Responded promptly to client inquiries and issues with a focus on improving customer experience and satisfaction levels, contributing to a **40% reduction** in response times.
Facilitated training sessions on newly developed products and technology, ensuring clients understand the value and usage of **Mechatronics** solutions.
Analyzed market trends and competitor activity to develop effective strategies that enhance the company's market position.
Utilized **English** proficiency to communicate effectively with diverse clients and stakeholders to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction and project success.

Developed technical support documentation and training materials for sales team on **Mechatronics** solutions, improving product knowledge by **40%**.
Collaborated with customers to understand their needs and deliver tailored sales presentations, enhancing customer satisfaction ratings by **25%**.
Utilized **Customer Relationship Management (CRM)** tools to track and analyze client interactions and sales performance, resulting in a **15%** increase in repeat business.
Negotiated contracts and pricing with clients to close deals effectively, achieving a **10%** increase in sales revenue.
Conducted market development research to identify new opportunities and generate leads, contributing to a **30%** expansion in market share.
Provided technical support to clients during and after the sales process, reducing customer complaints and troubleshooting time by **20%**.
Maintained up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and competitor products, ensuring competitive advantage during negotiations.
Presented complex technical concepts in clear, concise English to non-technical stakeholders, enhancing communication and understanding.
Engaged in regular follow-ups with clients to ensure satisfaction and identify opportunities for up-selling or cross-selling products.

• Leveraged strong negotiation skills to effectively manage customer relationships, increasing sales opportunities by 15%.
• Utilized technical support expertise to assist clients in resolving issues related to the internal CRM system, enhancing user satisfaction by 25%.
• Contributed to market development strategies, identifying new business opportunities through technical insights and customer feedback.
• Advised on integrating mechatronics solutions to improve sales pitches, resulting in a sales conversion rate increase of **30%**.
• Developed customer-focused presentations that showcased product capabilities using **PowerPoint** and **Excel**, leading to a **40%** boost in client engagement.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to support product launches, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with market needs.
• Conducted technical workshops and training sessions in English, effectively educating clients and sales teams about product features and benefits.
• Maintained up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and competitor offerings, providing valuable insights to enhance sales strategies.
• Provided continuous feedback on CRM functionality and market effectiveness, helping to inform product development and improvements.
